name: Jerma Maze
description: Welcome to Jerma Maze, Jerma Maze is the worst game ever made in Microsoft Powerpoint. It's only available on version 1.1, if you are one of the member of telbar you probably know that i upload the version 1.0. It is recommended to use a mouse. Warning:The soundtracks i use we're not made from me, you might want to delete the soundtracks from the presentation.
